use_of_proceeds: Construction of 50MW solar photovoltaic farm with battery storage. Installation of solar panels on 200 hectares of semi-arid land. Project includes grid connection infrastructure and on-site maintenance facilities.
Development of 200MW offshore wind farm in the North Sea. Installation of 40 floating wind turbines, subsea cables, and onshore substation. Project will power 150,000 homes with clean electricity.
Procurement of 50 electric buses and installation of charging infrastructure. Retrofit of existing depot with fast-charging stations. Training programs for drivers and maintenance staff.
Construction of advanced wastewater treatment facility with 50 MLD capacity. Installation of membrane bioreactor technology for water recycling. Treated water will be supplied to industrial parks.

Construction of LEED Platinum certified office complex with 50,000 sqm of floor space. Features include rooftop solar, rainwater harvesting, smart building management system, and EV charging stations.
